schema.title: Nuxt Server
schema.description: Serves a Nuxt application for development.

debug.description: Set to true to enable debug mode.

dev.description: Whether Nuxt is running in development mode.

ssr.description: Whether to enable rendering of HTML - either dynamically (in server mode) or at generate time. If set to false generated pages will have no content.

https.description: Listen with https protocol with a self-signed certificate by default.
